def_cn: 稀奇古怪的；不同寻常的；搞怪的
def_en: If you describe something as off-the-wall, you mean that it is unusual and rather strange but in an amusing or interesting way.

def_cn: （人、思想、行为方式）疯狂的，愚蠢的
def_en: If you say that a person, their ideas, or their ways of doing something are off-the-wall, you are critical of them because you think they are mad or very foolish.
